text: 6:20 2 Korin 5:20; Filipai 1:20; Filemon 1:9-10Kɨ Akar Aghuim gumazamizir igharazibav kɨmasa, egha Krais Iesusɨn abuir gumazimɨn ikia, kamaghɨn kɨ datɨrɨghɨn kalabusɨn iti. Eghtɨ ia God ko mɨkɨm suam, kɨ an Akar Aghuimɨn gun mɨkɨmsɨ, a gavgavim na danightɨ, kɨ atiatingan koghɨva bighɨvɨra Akar Aghuim mɨkɨmam.
